SELECT DISTINCT
FROM aos_module, aos_role_module WHERE aos_module.id = aos_role_module.module_id AND aos_module.is_enable = '1' AND aos_role_module.grant_type = #{grant_type} AND aos_role_module.role_id IN ( SELECT role_id FROM aos_user_role WHERE user_id = #{user_id} )
AND ${fnLength}(aos_module.cascade_id) = ${length}
AND aos_module.cascade_id like '${cascade_id}%'
AND aos_module.menu_type = '${menu_type}'
AND aos_module.menu_type != 'F'
ORDER BY aos_module.sort_no ASC
